attributes.action: prevent the closure of Midgley post office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Midgley post office is due to close in August as part of the post office campaign.
Midgley, Nr halifax should not close because:-
1. it is a rural post office, with no access to other post offices within easy each. The nearest one is a 40 minute bus ride.
2. It costs the post office NOTHING to run. The overheads are paid for by Midgley community shop and community room
3. it is used by over 50 people a week.
4. It is  held up as an example nationwide on how a community can work together to maintain services in  a rural village.
5. The post master has won a major award for servicesto the community.
6. It provides a lifeline to many disabled, elderley and young parents in a remote hillside village
Please support our village . We are only a small village and are reallly trying hard to keep a  post office, shop and community room going. We have the enthusiasm, support and have proved we can do it!
